title: Gama Pehlwan, undefeated wrestler ‘The Great Gama,’ honored in Google Doodle
content:
The latest Google Doodle honors the undefeated Indian wrestler Gama Pehlwan, aka “The Great Gama,” on his 144th birthday.

more…
